tool.name: Grids from classified grid and table
tool.description: Creates several grids using a classified grid and a table with data values for each class.

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: The table with the (numeric) data values for each class. The tool creates a grid for each table column (besides the ID).

param.name: ID_FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: The attribute with the class IDs, used to link the table and the grid.

param.name: CLASSES
param.label: Classes
param.help: The grid coded with the class IDs.
